verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:27
verses.text: And the Lord shall scatter you among the nations, and ye shall be left few in number among the heathen, whither the Lord shall lead you.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:28
verses.text: And there ye shall serve gods, the work of men’s hands, wood and stone, which neither see, nor hear, nor eat, nor smell.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 4:29
verses.text: But if from thence thou shalt seek the Lord thy God, thou shalt find him, if thou seek him with all thy heart and with all thy soul.
